oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Map of Roane Iron Company's Amended Addition to the City of Chattanooga, Tenn.
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Plat map filed on October 19, 1886, with officials of the City of Chattanooga, Hamilton County, Tennessee, showing administrative and housing buildings, as well as the company railroad line.

Former Union general John T. Wilder, whose Chattanooga residence, along with that of prominent iron man H.S. Chamberlain, is shown on this map, was one of the founders of the Roane Iron Company. He also oversaw the company's expansion into Chattanooga where it added to the city's growing prosperity.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Roane Iron Company--Maps
Building a Future Through Opportunity
